posts.title: Introduction to JSON Server
posts.content: JSON Server is a tool that lets you create a fake REST API with zero coding in less than 30 seconds.
posts.author: John Doe

posts.title: Setting Up JSON Server
posts.content: In this post, we'll walk through setting up JSON Server to create a simple REST API.
posts.author: Jane Smith

posts.title: Creating Routes with JSON Server
posts.content: Learn how to create custom routes with JSON Server to handle complex API requirements.
posts.author: Alice Johnson

posts.title: Using JSON Server with React
posts.content: This post explains how to integrate JSON Server with a React application to fetch and display data.
posts.author: Bob Brown

posts.title: Deploying JSON Server
posts.content: Deploying JSON Server to the cloud can be straightforward. Learn how to do it in this post.
posts.author: Carol White
